item.title: Postmortem: unRAID Flash Device Failure
item.description: Status: Complete, action items in progress. Summary: unRAID’s OS Flash Device failed undeteced for 14 days, preventing server to successfully reboot, taking all internal services down, including pfSense VM which prevented home network from accessing internet.
